name: La Postinière
description:
"La Postiniere" is a little game created in 5 days buy 5 people for a Jam organized in our school. The theme was "Play the real" so the game is like a Job Simulator in which you are a postman and you have to deliver packages.

We recommand you to use fullscreen & headset for a better experience ;)

Credits:
- Thibault Arloing as Developer
- Florian Boursier as VFX & 3D Artist
- Guillaume Leroux as 2D/3D Artist
- Lucie Ntsiba as Character Designer and Animator
- Pierrick Bejan as Level Designer
